text.title: Be the Person You Were Meant to Be
text.head: Be the Person You Were Meant to Be
text.p: If you are reading this , you have found yourself not content with the way your life is headed . Maybe you 're just wanting a little self-help . Possibly none of these apply to you and you 're just reading this because you feel like it . Whatever it may be , you 're reading it , and if you finish this article I can guarantee that you will learn something about yourself , something that you may desperately be seeking or needing at this point in your life .
text.head: Steps

list.item: Move forward . Have you made mistakes ? Of course you have . Take a second to close your eyes and tell yourself that you 're normal , it 's normal to make mistakes . Have you ever done something that you wish you could take back ? Something that you would n't tell anyone ? That 's normal too . Today is the day that you become the person that you were always meant to be . That ca n't happen if you have baggage . Leave the past in the past . You my friend , have a chance to restart , and all you have to do is forget all the bad things that you did , all the things that has happened to you , and just move forward .

Accept yourself . We all wish we could be someone else , wish that maybe for just one day we would n't be so insecure , have the need to buy material things , as if that would make us more perfect , or more like that one person you wish you could be . But let me tell you something ; someone looks at you every day and thinks " Man , I wish I was like them . " You may be saying to yourself " yeah , right . " But it 's so true . When we can accept ourselves the way we are , and not always try to be better than someone , we could finally see that no one can be compared to us , no one can make you look bad , because your were made the way you are for a reason , and no one can take that away from you . When you find self-acceptance you will be that much closer to living a full and happy life you deserve .

Love yourself . You ca n't change what you did or who you were , but absolutely nothing can prevent you from being the person you want to be , from shaping yourself into the human that you want everyone to see when they look at you . You 're so lovable with all your flaws , and you do n't even need someone to tell you that . If you ca n't love yourself , than why should others love you ?

Grow . You 're constantly growing . Physically , that is . Today , grow spiritually . Accept yourself , try new things , grow in knowledge of yourself . Inside all of us , there is a light . A light that burns brighter than any flame . This light cannot and will not be extinguished , only hidden . Why , oh why , would you hide such a mesmerizing light ? Could it be that some one else may overpower yours ? Perhaps another person told you that yours is not beautiful ? Friend , yours is the most beautiful of anyone , none can overpower yours , for yours is unique . The hard part is not keeping this light on , but finding it , yours has been hidden for so long that you may not find it . Show the world your light , and let them see that your a person of such greatness that all will love you and respect you .

text.head: Tips

list.item: Love is an action , not a feeling . Love is the most natural thing in the world . Love everyone , and your true self will shine through .

text.head: Warnings

list.item: Do n't forget how loved you are .
